item.title: [prm] Pestilent Cauldron // Restorative Burst
item.description: Artifact // Sorcery

item.title: [prm] Torrent Sculptor // Flamethrower Sonata
item.description: Creature — Merfolk Wizard // Sorcery

item.title: [prm] Shaile, Dean of Radiance // Embrose, Dean of Shadow
item.description: Legendary Creature — Bird Cleric // Legendary Creature — Human Warlock

item.title: [prm] Selfless Glyphweaver // Deadly Vanity
item.description: Creature — Human Cleric // Sorcery

item.title: [prm] Valentin, Dean of the Vein // Lisette, Dean of the Root
item.description: Legendary Creature — Vampire Warlock // Legendary Creature — Human Druid

item.title: [prm] Uvilda, Dean of Perfection // Nassari, Dean of Expression
item.description: Legendary Creature — Djinn Wizard // Legendary Creature — Efreet Shaman

item.title: [prm] Blade Historian
item.description:
Creature — Human Cleric

Attacking creatures you control have double strike.

item.title: [prm] Blot Out the Sky
item.description:
Sorcery

Create X tapped 2/1 white and black Inkling creature tokens with flying. If X is 6 or more, destroy all noncreature, nonland permanents.

item.title: [prm] Body of Research
item.description:
Sorcery

Create a 0/0 green and blue Fractal creature token. Put X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of cards in your library.

item.title: [prm] Culling Ritual
item.description:
Sorcery

Destroy each nonland permanent with mana value 2 or less. Add {B} or {G} for each permanent destroyed this way.

item.title: [prm] Daemogoth Titan
item.description:
Creature — Demon

Whenever Daemogoth Titan attacks or blocks, sacrifice a creature.

item.title: [prm] Culmination of Studies
item.description:
Sorcery

Exile the top X cards of your library. For each land card exiled this way, create a Treasure token. For each blue card exiled this way, draw a card. For each red card exiled this way, Culmination of Studies deals 1 damage to each opponent.

item.title: [prm] Elemental Expressionist
item.description:
Creature — Orc Wizard

Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, choose target creature you control. Until end of turn, it gains "If this creature would leave the battlefield, exile it instead of putting it anywhere else" and "When this creature is put into exile, create a 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature token." (Each instance of that ability triggers separately.)

item.title: [prm] Dramatic Finale
item.description:
Enchantment

Creature tokens you control get +1/+1.

Whenever one or more nontoken creatures you control die, create a 2/1 white and black Inkling creature token with flying. This ability triggers only once each turn.

item.title: [prm] Double Major
item.description:
Instant

Copy target creature spell you control, except it isn't legendary if the spell is legendary. (A copy of a creature spell becomes a token.)

item.title: [prm] Hofri Ghostforge
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Dwarf Cleric

Spirits you control get +1/+1 and have trample and haste.

Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, exile it. If you do, create a token that's a copy of that creature, except it's a Spirit in addition to its other types and it has "When this creature leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to its owner's graveyard."

item.title: [prm] Harness Infinity
item.description:
Instant

Exchange your hand and graveyard.

Exile Harness Infinity.

item.title: [prm] Magma Opus
item.description:
Instant

Magma Opus deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets. Tap two target permanents. Create a 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature token. Draw two cards.

{U/R}{U/R}, Discard Magma Opus: Create a Treasure token.

item.title: [prm] Lorehold Command
item.description:
Instant

Choose two —

• Create a 3/2 red and white Spirit creature token.

• Creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain indestructible and haste until end of turn.

• Lorehold Command deals 3 damage to any target. Target player gains 3 life.

• Sacrifice a permanent, then draw two cards.

item.title: [prm] Quandrix Command
item.description:
Instant

Choose two —

• Return target creature or planeswalker to its owner's hand.

• Counter target artifact or enchantment spell.

• Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature.

• Target player shuffles up to three target cards from their graveyard into their library.

item.title: [prm] Prismari Command
item.description:
Instant

Choose two —

• Prismari Command deals 2 damage to any target.

• Target player draws two cards, then discards two cards.

• Target player creates a Treasure token.

• Destroy target artifact.

item.title: [prm] Manifestation Sage
item.description:
Creature — Human Wizard

When Manifestation Sage enters the battlefield, create a 0/0 green and blue Fractal creature token. Put X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of cards in your hand.

item.title: [prm] Silverquill Command
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose two —

• Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains flying until end of turn.

• Return target creature card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

• Target player draws a card and loses 1 life.

• Target opponent sacrifices a creature.

item.title: [prm] Rushed Rebirth
item.description:
Instant

Choose target creature. When that creature dies this turn, search your library for a creature card with lesser mana value, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

item.title: [prm] Radiant Scrollwielder
item.description:
Creature — Dwarf Cleric

Instant and sorcery spells you control have lifelink.

At the beginning of your upkeep, exile an instant or sorcery card at random from your graveyard. You may cast it this turn. If a spell cast this way would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.

item.title: [prm] Vanishing Verse
item.description:
Instant

Exile target monocolored permanent.

item.title: [prm] Silverquill Silencer
item.description:
Creature — Human Cleric

As Silverquill Silencer enters the battlefield, choose a nonland card name.

Whenever an opponent casts a spell with the chosen name, they lose 3 life and you draw a card.

item.title: [prm] Witherbloom Command
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose two —

• Target player mills three cards, then you return a land card from your graveyard to your hand.

• Destroy target noncreature, nonland permanent with mana value 2 or less.

• Target creature gets -3/-1 until end of turn.

• Target opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

item.title: [prm] Venerable Warsinger
item.description:
Creature — Spirit Cleric

Vigilance, trample

Whenever Venerable Warsinger deals combat damage to a player, you may return target creature card with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield, where X is the amount of damage Venerable Warsinger dealt to that player.

item.title: [prm] The Biblioplex
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{2}, {T}: Look at the top card of your library. If it's an instant or sorcery card, you may reveal it and put it into your hand. If you don't put the card into your hand, you may put it into your graveyard. Activate only if you have exactly zero or seven cards in hand.

item.title: [prm] Strixhaven Stadium
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add {C}. Put a point counter on Strixhaven Stadium.

Whenever a creature deals combat damage to you, remove a point counter from Strixhaven Stadium.

Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to an opponent, put a point counter on Strixhaven Stadium. Then if it has ten or more point counters on it, remove them all and that player loses the game.

item.title: [prm] Codie, Vociferous Codex
item.description:
Legendary Artifact Creature — Construct

You can't cast permanent spells.

{4}, {T}: Add {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}. When you cast your next spell this turn, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile an instant or sorcery card with lesser mana value. Until end of turn, you may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Put each other card exiled this way on the bottom of your library in a random order.

item.title: [prm] Hall of Oracles
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

{T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery and only if you've cast an instant or sorcery spell this turn.

item.title: [prm] Furycalm Snarl
item.description:
Land

As Furycalm Snarl enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Mountain or Plains card from your hand. If you don't, Furycalm Snarl enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {R} or {W}.

item.title: [prm] Frostboil Snarl
item.description:
Land

As Frostboil Snarl enters the battlefield, you may reveal an Island or Mountain card from your hand. If you don't, Frostboil Snarl enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {U} or {R}.

item.title: [prm] Vineglimmer Snarl
item.description:
Land

As Vineglimmer Snarl enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Forest or Island card from your hand. If you don't, Vineglimmer Snarl enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {G} or {U}.

item.title: [prm] Shineshadow Snarl
item.description:
Land

As Shineshadow Snarl enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Plains or Swamp card from your hand. If you don't, Shineshadow Snarl enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {W} or {B}.

item.title: [prm] Necroblossom Snarl
item.description:
Land

As Necroblossom Snarl enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Swamp or Forest card from your hand. If you don't, Necroblossom Snarl enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {B} or {G}.

item.title: [prm] Rowan, Scholar of Sparks // Will, Scholar of Frost
item.description: Legendary Planeswalker — Rowan // Legendary Planeswalker — Will

item.title: [prm] Mila, Crafty Companion // Lukka, Wayward Bonder
item.description: Legendary Creature — Fox // Legendary Planeswalker — Lukka

item.title: [prm] Kasmina, Enigma Sage
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Kasmina

Each other planeswalker you control has the loyalty abilities of Kasmina, Enigma Sage.

+2: Scry 1.

−X: Create a 0/0 green and blue Fractal creature token. Put X +1/+1 counters on it.

−8: Search your library for an instant or sorcery card that shares a color with this planeswalker, exile that card, then shuffle. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost.

item.title: [prm] Shadrix Silverquill
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Elder Dragon

Flying, double strike

At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may choose two. Each mode must target a different player.

• Target player creates a 2/1 white and black Inkling creature token with flying.

• Target player draws a card and loses 1 life.

• Target player puts a +1/+1 counter on each creature they control.

item.title: [prm] Galazeth Prismari
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Elder Dragon

Flying

When Galazeth Prismari enters the battlefield, create a Treasure token.

Artifacts you control have "{T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast an instant or sorcery spell."

item.title: [prm] Velomachus Lorehold
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Elder Dragon

Flying, vigilance, haste

Whenever Velomachus Lorehold attacks, look at the top seven cards of your library. You may cast an instant or sorcery spell with mana value less than or equal to Velomachus Lorehold's power from among them without paying its mana cost. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

item.title: [prm] Tanazir Quandrix
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Elder Dragon

Flying, trample

When Tanazir Quandrix enters the battlefield, double the number of +1/+1 counters on target creature you control.

Whenever Tanazir Quandrix attacks, you may have the base power and toughness of other creatures you control become equal to Tanazir Quandrix's power and toughness until end of turn.

item.title: [prm] Beledros Witherbloom
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Elder Dragon

Flying

At the beginning of each upkeep, create a 1/1 black and green Pest creature token with "When this creature dies, you gain 1 life."

Pay 10 life: Untap all lands you control. Activate only once each turn.

item.title: [mid] Hobbling Zombie
item.description:
Creature — Zombie

Deathtouch

When Hobbling Zombie dies, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature with decayed. (It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)

https://www.gamestar.de/artikel/magic-the-gathering-spoiler-karte-innistrad-midnight-hunt,3373128.html

item.title: [mid] Dissipate
item.description:
Instant

Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.

https://twitter.com/MartaBranc0/status/1433808020476137509

item.title: [mid] "Pickle-Jar Zombie"
item.description:
Creature — Zombie

Defender

Tap three untapped creatures you control: Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.

https://mein-mmo.de/magic-the-gathering-innistrad-preview/

item.title: [mid] Bladestitched Skaab
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Soldier

Other Zombies you control get +1/+0.

https://twitter.com/CoreyBaumeister/status/1433818151356096514
